entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
